metadata.title: Privacy Policy | AI Tool Navigation
metadata.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use our website.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.item1: Content you provide on the site (such as search terms)
section1.item2: Site usage data (e.g., browser, language preferences, page visits, etc.)
section1.item3: Anonymous identifiers that may be generated for analysis and abuse prevention

section2.title: 2. How We Use Information
section2.item1: Provide and improve site functionality and search results
section2.item3: Perform statistical analysis with consent or within legal permissions

section3.title: 3. Cookies and Local Storage
section3.content: We may use cookies and local storage to save language preferences, session information, and anonymous identifiers. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser, but some features may be limited.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share necessary information with trusted third-party service providers when required to provide services, fulfill legal obligations, or with your consent.

section5.title: 5. Data Security and Retention
section5.content: We take reasonable measures to protect data security and retain data for the period necessary to achieve collection purposes, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: Under applicable law, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal information. Please contact us through the contact information below to communicate your requests.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions about this policy or our privacy practices, please contact us via email:

privacy.disclaimer: This page is a general example text. Specific details should be refined according to your actual business, jurisdiction, and legal advisor recommendations.

metadata.title: Terms of Service | AI Tool Navigation
metadata.description: Read our terms of service to understand the rules and conditions for using this platform

service.title: Terms of Service
service.intro: Welcome to our AI Tool Navigation platform. By using this website, you agree to comply with the following terms of service. Please read these terms carefully.

section1.title: 1. Service Description
section1.content: This platform provides discovery, comparison, and recommendation services for AI tools. We strive to provide users with accurate and timely AI tool information, but do not guarantee the completeness or accuracy of the information.

section2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
section2.content: When using this platform, you agree to:
section2.item2: Not engage in any illegal or unauthorized activities
section2.item3: Not interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of the platform
section2.item4: Respect the intellectual property and privacy rights of others

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.content: All content on this platform, including but not limited to:
section3.footer: are protected by intellectual property law. Without permission, no content may be copied, distributed, or modified.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Links
section4.content: This platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these external websites. You access third-party websites at your own risk.

section5.title: 5. Disclaimer
section5.content: This platform provides services on an 'as is' basis, without any express or implied warranties. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of this platform.

section6.title: 6. Terms Changes
section6.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms of service at any time. Significant changes will be notified to users through website announcements or email. Continued use of this platform indicates your acceptance of the modified terms.

section7.title: 7. Applicable Law
section7.content: These terms of service are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. Any disputes arising from these terms should be resolved through amicable negotiation, and if negotiation fails, should be submitted to a court with jurisdiction for adjudication.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us:

service.disclaimer: This page is a general example text. Specific details should be refined according to your actual business, jurisdiction, and legal advisor recommendations.

categoryDetails.title: Category Details
categoryDetails.positiveGrowthTagsDesc: Other tags commonly found on products with positive growth rates
categoryDetails.negativeGrowthTagsDesc: Other tags commonly found on products with negative growth rates
categoryDetails.positiveGrowthTagsHint: These tags often appear together with "{category}" on growing products, potentially representing market opportunities and related tracks.
categoryDetails.negativeGrowthTagsHint: These tags often appear together with "{category}" on declining products, and may require caution about market risks of these combinations.

categoryDetails.inDecliningProducts: Among {count} declining products, {tagCount} have this tag
categoryDetails.noGrowingProducts: No growing products or related tags
categoryDetails.noDecliningProducts: No declining products or related tags

dataDiagnostics.title: Data Diagnostics
dataDiagnostics.subtitle: Understand current data distribution
dataDiagnostics.noOpportunities: Currently no categories meet both "small-scale" (â‰¤50) and "high-growth" (â‰¥10%) criteria
dataDiagnostics.noHighGrowth: All categories have average growth rates below 10%, suggest focusing on medium-growth categories
dataDiagnostics.noSmallCategories: All categories have more than 50 products, market is relatively mature
dataDiagnostics.topOpportunitiesHint: Top 5 potential categories with size â‰¤100 are listed above, worth focusing on

dataFilter.title: Data Quality Filter
dataFilter.subtitle: Filter low-traffic products to avoid inflated growth rates
dataFilter.reason1: Low-traffic products tend to have inflated growth rates (e.g., 100% growth from 100 to 200)
dataFilter.reason2: Products with 0 visits may be data collection anomalies
dataFilter.reason3: Filtered analysis results are more realistic and valuable
dataFilter.suggestion1: Recommend setting at least 500 threshold to filter out very low-traffic products
dataFilter.suggestion2: Current setting can filter most abnormal data
dataFilter.suggestion3: Current setting is suitable for general analysis scenarios
dataFilter.suggestion4: Current setting is suitable for focusing on top products
